snippet.title: CatSacks - Hidden Object Game
snippet.description:
My first solo developed/designed video game in Unity!
                Demo now out on Steam and Itch.io!
****  https:// store.steampowered.com/app/2352480/CatSacks    ****
****  https:// commacrash.itch.io/catsacks    ****
****  https:// Catsacks.io   ****

Audio stylings graciously provided by SpongemanCC!

CatSacks is a cozy hidden object game of fuzzy friends with a little twist of Rube Goldbergesque puzzle solving fun. Or, on a more personal level, an homage to the early Where’s Waldo books, internet Flash games and recent Hidden Folks adventure by Adriaan de Jongh and Sylvain Tegroeg.

I’m excited, and – let’s be real, a little terrified, to be announcing my first ever Kickstarter (coming soon) for my first ever solo video game made with Unity – CatSacks.

My first solo game was originally just to be about learning C# and Unity in order to create CYOA (Choose Your Own Adventure) visual novels.  However, a silly conversation with friends and seeing the origin story of Hidden Folks (seriously, play this game, it’s a chill joy) made creating CatSacks the obvious choice.
